name: Harris Tweed Gentlemans Kilt
description:
Traditional, hand sewn, 6 yard Gentlemans Kilt. 

Bespoke service.

Please contact Netty at Diggory Brown to confirm required measurements and cloth colour/pattern.

Made in the Outer Hebrides

name: Harris Tweed Hood - Gaiter
description:
Created from the remnants of cloth after making a kilt. These Harris Tweed Hood - Gaiters are lined with brushed cotton to provide extra warmth and comfort. 
Ideal for use as a scarf and hat replacement or to add that extra layer of warmth around your neck if you live in a non - centrally heated house! (Like we do). 

Available in Small, Medium and Large.
Alternative colours are available. 
Please contact Diggory Brown at:
thetailorshouse@googlemail.com

All items are Made in the Outer Hebrides

name: Cuffs (pair)
description:
Cut from the remnants of cloth after making a kilt and secured with handmade leather straps, these wrist cuffs can be worn individually or as a pair. 

Alternative colours are available. 
To discuss options please contact Diggory Brown:
thetailorshouse@googlemail.com

All items are Made in the Outer Hebrides

name: Harris Tweed Roll pleated Ladies Kilt
description:
4yrds of Harris Tweed are pleated into this ladies kilt. 
Once the canvas and buckles have been sewn on by hand, the pleats are left unpressed to create a 'rolled pleat'.
Availbale in UK sizes: 6, 8, 10, 12 and 14.

Alternative colours are available. Please contact Diggory Brown to discuss at: thetailorshouse@googlemail.com

Made in the Outer Hebrides

name: Harris Tweed Scallop Pleated Ladies Kilt
description:
Harris Tweed Scallop Pleated Ladies Kilt
4yrds of Harris Tweed are pleated into this unique ladies kilt.
After the canvas, lining and buckles are sewn on by hand, the pleats and front apron are finished to create a curved, scalloped effect. 
Available in UK sizes: 6, 8, 10, 12 and 14.

Made in the Outer Hebrides

Alternative colours are available. 
Please contact Diggory Brown to discuss at:
thetailorshouse@googlemail.com
